page.title: 03Torphichen Parents Assoc.
page.content: The Torphichen Parents Association is a group of parents and teachers who help raise money to buy equipment for the school. They have organized events such as Christmas Fairs, Barbecue and video nights. The Association has also held social events for parents and children such as quiz and bingo nights. The pupils from the school spent their craft time working hard for the Cristmas Fair making things such as macrame plant holders, soft toys, Christmas decorations and spice ropes. The parents also helped and the fair was a great success. Almost Â£300 was raised. The Barbecue was really a social event because although only Â£54.00 was raised one hundred and forty tickets were sold which is almost one fifth of the population of the village. It was a very popular event which is sure to be repeated.
